isb:document.p: Pointillist v2 is a set of MATLAB codes for inferring the set of elements affected by a perturbation of a biological system, based on multiple types of evidence. The software implements the full set of data integration methods discussed in the article

tr.td: Hwang D, Rust AG, Ramsey S, Smith JJ, Leslie DM, Weston AD, de Atauri P, Aitchison JD, Hood L, Siegel AF, Bolouri H. "A data integration methodology for systems biology." Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A 2005; 102(48) 17296-17301.

isb:document.p: The most recent version of the Pointillist v2 MATLAB codes is 2.1.2. In addition, a Java implementation of an earlier version of our nonparametric method (with the Fisher method) is available. We are presently adapting our Java version to conform to the method outlined in the above articles, but the Java version should give equivalent results to the MATLAB version on most datasets.

ul.li: Download Pointillist v2.1.2 [1.4 MB ZIP archive of MATLAB codes] [This version includes Fisher's method, the Mudholkar-George method, and the Liptak-Stouffer method, as described in the above article. In addition, v2.1.2 fixes some minor issues with the previous version.] [README]
